General.Name: Dalata Hotel Group plc
General.Description: Dalata Hotel Group plc owns and operates hotels under the Maldron Hotels and Clayton Hotels brand names in Dublin, Regional Ireland, and the United Kingdom. The company operates three-star and four-star hotels. It also operates Grain & Grill restaurants; Club Vitae health leisure clubs; and Red Bean Roastery coffee shop. In addition, the company engages in the financing, catering, hotel management, management, and property investment and holding activities. Dalata Hotel Group plc was founded in 2007 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.
